modules.description: This module enables low-level interaction with an SMT solver via direct API bindings, offering operations to configure solver instances, define structured sorts (bit-vectors, arrays, functions, floating-points), and construct or analyze logical terms. It manipulates data such as solver contexts, typed expressions, and constraint formulas to support tasks like formal verification of software or hardware systems, where precise reasoning about bit-level behavior, arithmetic properties, or complex data structures is critical. Key capabilities include satisfiability checking, model extraction, and unsat core generation
